name: I think I’d use the Micro.blog iOS app for status updates exclusively if it supported Micropub syndicate-to. @manton has done a great job making an attractive and functional app! Looking forward to continued evolution.

content.html: I think I’d use the Micro.blog iOS app for status updates exclusively if it supported Micropub syndicate-to. @manton has done a great job making an attractive and functional app! Looking forward to continued evolution.

summary: @cleverdevil Thanks! Hopefully syndicate-to support isn't far off. Just need to work on the UI and where it will fit.

summary: @manton awesome! I also recognize it’s likely not the most common use case, but I’m definitely looking forward to it.
